content: crochet a stylish tulip hexagon throw with this pdf pattern available as an instant download this pattern contains written instructions in english and uses us crochet terminology the finished measurements are lapghan 47 x 37 / 120 x 94 cm small throw 54 x 44 / 137 x 112 cm larger throw 61 x 51 / 155 x 130 cm yarn used lion brand wool-ease hook size 6mm total yardage 700g 900g 1100g the printable pdf has a total of 12 pages including * written pattern in us terms * photo tutorial * graphs there is also a free video tutorial available on youtube --- ***questions & returns*** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern --- ***please note *** please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns you can find the free version here https //wilmade com/tulip-hexagon-throw/ ***find me on social media*** patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg youtube https //www youtube com/c/wilmawestenberg
